name: Ferret Beuller's Day Off
description:
Ferret Beuller has escaped her cage to cause chaos for one last time before she moves with her owners to a new house. Missions, animations, and improved movements are still to be added. Made in collaboration with Ronica Singh for Women Game Jam South Africa 2022. 

Assets created- House and character

Free assets used- 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/scivolo-character-controller...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/apartment-kit-124055

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/camera/ms-advanced-camera-controller...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/low-poly-fruit-pickups-98135
